snippet: What was shaping up as a very long day of Olympic tennis for Rafael Nadal began shortly after 11 a.m., when he played the first point of what would become a victory that put him in the singles quarterfinals....
lead_paragraph: What was shaping up as a very long day of Olympic tennis for Rafael Nadal began shortly after 11 a.m., when he played the first point of what would become a victory that put him in the singles quarterfinals.

headline.print_headline: On Long Day, Nadal Assures Self, Spain of at Least 1 Medal
headline.main: On Long Day, Nadal Assures Self, Spain of at Least 1 Medal
